document.full_text: for three decades, both u.s. political parties have employed rhetorical weapons in the struggle over debts and taxes. now, the two issues have collided.
document.title: letter from washington: facing off over the u.s. fiscal fiasco
lines_and_colors: for three decades, both u.s. political parties have employed rhetorical weapons in the struggle over debts and taxes. now, the two issues have collided.
